name: codevember-gameboy-color-pure-css
title: #Codevember | Gameboy Color | Pure CSS
description:
Bringing back the nostalgia with a Gameboy Color using only CSS

*Update* I have since released a 50-day email challenge where each weekday (do less if you'd like) you'll be sent a pure CSS image to code. Check it out at http://dailycssimages.com/
